reviews.review: Avengers: Infinity War (Non-Spoiler Review) After having the opportunity to see this film for a second time and not feel so emotionally destroyed. I believe I am finally ready to talk about the culmination of 10 years of Marvel films that is Infinity War. But at the same time it is way too hard to discuss things in debt without going into spoiler territory. So I’ll stick to the basics. The story arch was fantastic, the matchups were hilarious, and the stakes and emotion felt real. This movie gave me so much more than I ever thought possible, and surprised me at almost every turn. If you haven’t been following this cinematic journey from the beginning, first of all I feel bad for you. But secondly while I do believe it is possible for you to watch this movie and still enjoy it for what it is. I cannot begin to explain to you the complexity of storylines and events that have led to this. All I can say is WOW, they really did it. It took me to a place I never thought it would go, and I can’t wait to see what’s next! Rating: 10/10

After 10 years, finally all MCU superheroes against the great supervillain in the universe.
 must watch move!!!!!!
I really expected a lot more from this movie! 10 years of a universe that ends in a ridiculous way. Thanos is Jesus Christ looking for the church .... very innocent deaths.
A lot of bark, not much bite. Very disappointed.

Marvel has created a history in the industry and even though I'm feeling devastated, I'd give Avengers: Infinity War a solid 4 stars. The effort it took to build this movie and the guts to pull off that ending is insane. Also, 1 Star for Starlord

That movie was not much better than the last jedi.  Really dumb plot holes.  Not cohesive and way less chemistry than other Avengers movies.  The whole movie was just a setup for Captain Marvel?  Lame.  I think they had 8th graders write the script.

I've never been disappointed in an Avengers movie until now. Why try to fit so much in? Also taking the good about a character and over doing it makes it too much. That said, I loved all the characters being together at once. I'm excited to see the last Avengers next year!
Amazing! Had a starwars vibe!! Worth the wait

Finally, Marvel gifted us with this fantastic movie, great action scenes, great effects, great scrip. Avengers: Infinity War offers everything, tension, comedy, tragedy.
I affirm with certainty, is the best hero movie ever made.
I feel like I was inside infinity, so long... without ending!
